name: Journey to the Moon
description:
Journey to the Moon

This is a submission for the Github Game Off 2020 on itch.io: https://itch.io/jam/game-off-2020

https://github.com/chronick/moonshot-game

Devs Note:

Windows and Linux builds are provided for your convenience but not tested since I'm developing this on a mac. Let us know if they're broken and I'll try to get them fixed!

Overview

The Last Place on Earth is no longer habitable. Survive the dangers of space to reach The Guardian of Tides, our Moon. 

This is an Oregon Trail-style adventure game that takes place in space! After successfully launching the spaceship, survive the various minigames that appear to make it to the moon.

We wanted to add more variety to the events and minigames, but didn't have time to finish them before the deadline. We may add more to this later just for fun!

Credits

  • Art/Modeling: Julian Rebel
  • Writing: Timothy J. Seppala
  • Coding: Nick Donohue

Asset sources:

  • Satellites: https://kenney.nl/assets/space-shooter-extension
  • Planet texture: https://opengameart.org/textures/5614
  • Moon texture: https://opengameart.org/content/planetary-textures-2048x1024
